United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit

                    TRANSITIONAL CARE CENTER,

                      Petitioner, Appellee,

                               v.

   TOMMY G. THOMPSON, SECRETARY OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES,

                     Respondent, Appellant.


                       SECOND ERRATA SHEET

16, 2002 is corrected as follows:
